title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 22, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 22, 2020
description:
On Today's DP show, Dan and the guys recap last night's Raiders win in their new home, Las Vegas. At 2-0, are the Raiders the real deal? NBCSN Chris Simms, Dallas Morning News Tim Cowlishaw, 3x National Champion Head Football Coach Urban Meyer and NBC Sports Boston Tom Curran all join in on the program.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
